about_the_game: A small snippet of the full game. Players will get to experience what a small dungeons and boss feels like, along with melee and some magic gameplay. This demo takes place in the future, years after the full games events take place.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood when fighting and sometimes decapitation from swords

detailed_description: A small snippet of the full game. Players will get to experience what a small dungeons and boss feels like, along with melee and some magic gameplay. This demo takes place in the future, years after the full games events take place.
name: The Host: Cataclysm Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
